v8:item.v8:content: Description of a task or business process
Description of a task or business process
Description of a task or business process
Description of a task or business process
Description of a task or business process
Description of a task or business process

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT Tasks.Ref, Tasks.DeletionMark, Tasks.Number, Tasks.Date, Tasks.BusinessProcess, Tasks.RoutePoint, Tasks.Description, Tasks.Executed, Tasks.Importance, CASE WHEN Tasks.Importance = VALUE(Enum.TaskImportanceOptions.Low) THEN 0 WHEN Tasks.Importance = VALUE(Enum.TaskImportanceOptions.High) THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS ImportancePicture, Tasks.CompletionDate, Tasks.Author, Tasks.Details, Tasks.DueDate, Tasks.ExecutionResult, Tasks.Performer, Tasks.PerformerRole, Tasks.MainAddressingObject, Tasks.AdditionalAddressingObject, Tasks.Presentation, Tasks.AcceptedForExecution, CASE WHEN Tasks.BusinessProcessState = VALUE(Enum.BusinessProcessStates.Stopped) THEN True ELSE False END AS Stopped FROM Task.PerformerTask AS Tasks
WHERE Tasks.Topic = &FilterParameter AND Tasks.BusinessProcessState = VALUE(Enum.BusinessProcessStates.Active)
